title: LF AD or Support Duo - Diamond Elo with *HIGH WIN RATE ONLY*

embed.description: SkaIIy / Diamond 5 0LP / 28W 18L Win Ratio 61% / Kog'Maw - 10W 3L Win Ratio 77%, Varus - 4W 2L Win Ratio 67%, Lulu - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Twitch - 4W 1L Win Ratio 80%, Xayah - 0W 4L Win Ratio 0%

body:
Looking for AD or Support to duo and climb fast to Master S8. I Play either roles. I main Rageblade AD Carries, Kog, Varus. Also Twitch Xayah. For Supports I main Lulu, Rakan, Janna, Braum, Alistar.

Looking for AD players who:
-Excel in both micro and macro plays.
-Able to carry 2v8.
-Mains HYPERCARRY ADCs.

I play with high laning pressure, able to score kills during laning phrase and can usually 2v3 when their jungler ganks.

Also Looking for Support players who:
-Excel in both micro and macro plays.
-Able to peel off multiple enemies.
-Has high laning pressure
-Pref main Janna/Lulu/Nami/Braum

I play kogmaw as an assasin so you better shield me up and peel me :D

Do check out my OP.GG link, i need a botlane duo who has the ambition to climb up the ladder quickly. I am very picky on duo partners, i will scroll thru all ur op.gg games, stats etc.

My IGN is: skaiiy, 
add me in game and we can try some games out.

replies.body: I mean, I would gladly climb up the ladder quickly but I don't see any outstanding strategy from you so it will be a tough climb with what you are running with picks and summoners and such.
rageblade abuse hypercarry means if fed, can 2v5 with support. Easier carry and less dependent on teammates.

Vayne and kog with rageblade yes, varus doesn't have the passive to make good use of the rageblades double proc, Varus is better off with heavy ad for his ability scaling, with the exception of an enemy team with a lot of tanks(2-3).

furthermore taking heal on adc instead of the support means you don't have options for other better utility for yourself as an adc. Taking flash on the support also means they have lower limits for helping the adc.

Soooo Varus' W isn't a thing? I'm sure there's reasons not to build Rageblade Varus but I don't think "not having a passive for it" is one of them.

And you're saying, the ADC should never take heal? And the support should not take flash? Heal support is a thing with Ardent sure, but not taking flash on support because it "means they have lower limits for helping the ADC"? Fuck that's degrading who would ever want to support you if you can't even respect them as their own player?

You are right, I shall play soraka with an infinity edge instead of an ardent censer from now on, because if I don't it is degrading to be beneath the adc and support them instead of carry myself. I should attempt to take their cs as well so i can build my carry items, otherwise I would be considering myself to be beneath them and that is degrading.

Don't be a sheep, use your own brain with a completely neutral thought process without emotion. Otherwise you will be as illogical as the rest of humanity.

As a support main, I'm there to support you. I'm not your slave, I'm not your yes man, I'm your support, your backup. Just because my role is to make you *and the team* stronger, and to keep you *and the team* alive, doesn't mean I am worthless in my own right, and doesn't mean everything is about you.

But taking flash would make you inferior against a support who takes heal and exhaust instead. You would then be relatively worthless. So you are already taking the inferior strategic pathway.

You appear to think you have some kind of extra value by taking something that allows you a safety net to compensate for lack of strategic preparation.

By giving your adc more opportunity, you increase your teams chances of winning, which means you are contributing more to YOUR rank because your team wins, not you. You get mmr based on whether your team wins or loses.
